answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello:
I gathered some resources that might be of some help to you. 
This is a document from the Government Accountability Office that might lead you more directly to the resources you are looking for: http://www.gao.gov/assets/100/94322.pdf
This is a manual from the Montana Right-of-Way Utilities that addresses railroad agreements. Page 2 might have what you are looking for: http://www.mdt.mt.gov/other/rw/external/manual/chapter_46.pdf
This is a link to The National Railroad Construction and Maintenance Association, and this page might contain contact information that would help you with your research. http://www.nrcma.org/ps.home.cfm?ID=155
Peggy Chasler
Knowledge Network Intern
Pchasler@icma.org

author: Will Weber
text: The City of Lake Oswego manages the maintenance of 6.3 miles of railroad track and right-of-way. I am looking for samples of a maintenance contract. My goal is to contract out the maintenance with a unit price, work order activated contract. Can anyone help?
title: Railroad Maintenance Contract
